data.title: Games like Valis: The Fantasm Soldier • Games similar to Valis: The Fantasm Soldier • RAWG
data.meta_description: Games similar to Valis: The Fantasm Soldier on RAWG ✔ Video game discovery site ✔ The most comprehensive database that is powered by personal player experiences
data.text:
Valis III is an action-adventure game developed by Telenet Japan, Laser Soft and Reno. It was originally released in 1990. It was published by Telenet Japan. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Valis III on Genesis.

Valis II is an action-adventure game developed by Telenet Japan, Laser Soft and Reno. It came out on 23-06-1989. It was published by Sunsoft. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG. You can play Valis II on Genesis. It was scored by Tenpei Sato.

Valis IV is an action, adventure and platformer game developed by Telenet Japan and Laser Soft. It was originally released in 1991. Telenet Japan published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Valis IV on Nintendo Switch and SNES. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop.

Granada is a game developed by Namco Tales Studio and Wolf Team. It came out on 14-04-1990. It was published by Telenet Japan. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional". Granada is available on Genesis. It was scored by Masaaki Uno and Motoi Sakuraba.

Crackout is an action game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment. It came out on 13-12-1986. It was published by Palcom. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". Crackout is available on NES. Hidenori Maezawa, Hiroshi Takeyasu and Jun Funahashi scored the game.

Toricky is a casual, action, adventure and strategy game developed by Atelier Melon-Kissa. It came out on 13-01-2017. It was published by OtakuMaker.com. Toricky is available on macOS and PC. The game is sold via Steam.

Troublemaker is an indie action-adventure game developed by Gamecom Team. It was originally released in 2023. Freedom Games published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG. Troublemaker is available on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam and GOG.

Tobe's Vertical Adventure is an indie action-adventure game developed by Secret Base. It came out on 18-07-2011. Secret Base published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Tobe's Vertical Adventure has a score of 75. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". You can play Tobe's Vertical Adventure on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

Teleportals. I swear it's a nice game is an indie action-adventure game developed by PixelGreeds. It came out on 15-06-2018. PixelGreeds published the game. Teleportals. I swear it's a nice game is available on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.

Long Night is an indie action-adventure game developed by Trickster Face. It was originally released in 2014. Trickster Face published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip". Long Night is available on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.

Breathedge is an indie, action, adventure and simulation game developed by RedRuins Softworks. It came out on 25-02-2021. It was published by RedRuins Softworks. On review aggregator Metacritic, Breathedge has a score of 66. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. Breathedge is available on PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. You can purchase the game on Epic Games Store, Steam, GOG and Xbox Store.
